tasks.title: Implement channel-health auto-triage checklist in dashboard (owner/deadline/evidence + 24h closure KPI)

tasks.title: Adopt remediation artifact bundle script in closure workflow
tasks.notes: Added scripts/channel_remediation_bundle.sh and validated start run with latest symlink.

tasks.title: Guardrail: max-silence override for suppressed recurring warnings
tasks.notes: Implemented in scripts/heartbeat_guardrail_check.sh with reason-tagged escalation output.

tasks.title: Guardrail: coalesce hyper-frequent heartbeat repeats (10m min count interval)
tasks.notes: Implemented in heartbeat_guardrail_check.sh; immediate rerun verification shows rc unchanged.

tasks.title: Guardrail output: machine-searchable forced-unsuppress + escalation summary lines
tasks.notes: Added ESCALATION_SUMMARY and [UNSUPPRESS][FORCED] output format in heartbeat_guardrail_check.sh.

tasks.title: Remediation bundle metadata JSON for dashboard ingestion
tasks.notes: channel_remediation_bundle.sh now writes/updates meta.json with run fields and artifact paths.

tasks.title: Forced-unsuppress log correlation fields (ts_iso + event_id)
tasks.notes: heartbeat_guardrail_check.sh now emits [UNSUPPRESS][FORCED] lines with ts_iso and event_id.

tasks.title: Guardrail incident grouping fields (run_id + INCIDENT summary)
tasks.notes: heartbeat_guardrail_check.sh now emits run_id on escalation lines and INCIDENT summary for dashboard grouping.

tasks.title: Dashboard guardrail: validate unique task IDs before sync
Guardrail: enforce dashboard task-ID validation in heartbeat checks
tasks.notes: heartbeat_guardrail_check.sh now runs operation-dashboard/scripts/check-task-ids.mjs and fails on TASK_ID_VALIDATION_FAILED.

tasks.title: Guardrail metric: blocked remediation age (BLOCKED_REMEDIATION line)
tasks.notes: heartbeat_guardrail_check.sh now emits BLOCKED_REMEDIATION run summary when firstSeen age exceeds SLO.

tasks.title: Guardrail severity classification for blocked remediation age
tasks.notes: heartbeat_guardrail_check.sh now emits BLOCKED_REMEDIATION_SEVERITY based on maxAgeSec thresholds.

tasks.title: Guardrail action mapping for blocked remediation severity (SLA + next step)
tasks.notes: heartbeat_guardrail_check.sh now emits BLOCKED_REMEDIATION_ACTION with severity->SLA->nextStep mapping.

tasks.title: Guardrail SLA breach explicitness for blocked remediation
tasks.notes: Added BLOCKED_REMEDIATION_BREACH and ACTION_REQUIRED lines when high/critical severity exceeds SLA.
